name: Red Handsome Loop
description:
With a basket on your head, looping around the same stage, Red Handsome Loop is raring to go!

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys or WASD

Up - Jump , again for a double jump!

Down - Crouch

Left or Right - Punch.

You can also use Z,X,Spacebar or J,K,L

CREDITS

Jaime Gifte - code & art

Rabid Tunes - music & code
